Posted By: Hibron (4/23/2010 7:52:47 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Hello friend of omnath, I welcome thee. I think the major point of this card is to let you do two things, one is that you can now aggro with an omnath. Omnath + canopy cover and this card can pretty much end the game by turn 5 or 6. On top of that, what better way to cast eldrazi? They don't care what color you use, so if you stack up mana with omnath you can be playing your emrakul or your it that betrays super early. Not only that, but you get a card that doesn't die to day of judgement and can't be targeted, totally nuts when you think about it.
  
   
It wont win you every game, but it works so nicely in an enchantment deck, with some eldrazi thrown in to beat down.
posts.html:
Hello friend of omnath, I welcome thee. I think the major point of this card is to let you do two things, one is that you can now aggro with an omnath. Omnath + canopy cover and this card can pretty much end the game by turn 5 or 6. On top of that, what better way to cast eldrazi? They don't care what color you use, so if you stack up mana with omnath you can be playing your emrakul or your it that betrays super early. Not only that, but you get a card that doesn't die to day of judgement and can't be targeted, totally nuts when you think about it.

It wont win you every game, but it works so nicely in an enchantment deck, with some eldrazi thrown in to beat down.
